node.display_long_description:
"加入 Epic Roller Coasters ，乘坐过山车在特色场景和环境飞速穿行，感受异于生活的刺激冒险！

游戏共推出四种模式：
- 单人模式：家人、好友和您各自驾驶一辆过山车。
- 多人模式：模拟现实场景，众人同坐一趟过山车。您可以选择与好友，或是与来自世界各地的玩家们同乘一趟过山车，自拍精彩画面，并在在冒险结束后发布分享，留作纪念。
- 竞速模式：自定义过山车驾驶时间，或是向好友发起挑战，勇夺极速桂冠！
- 射击模式：完美融合两大神奇世界！同时享受酣畅淋漓的过山车活动和射击游戏！启动慢动作功能，通过完全截然不同的游戏视角观察环境，快速瞄准目标，打破射击成绩！

每趟旅程均将为您提供专属过山车和武器，让你选择最适合的装备和武器挑战不同冒险，提升排行榜名次！"

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
- It's Xmas time! And the North Pole ride just get a remaster with plenty of new events and better graphics.
- Snowland, Oasis, Twilight and Great Canyon have the events happening now also in Shooter mode.

node.display_short_description: The Premium Bundle allows you to unlock ALL the roller coasters in the game, plus new cars and new weapons. All game modes are included.

nodes.title: North Pole Remaster
nodes.body_text:
Hello everybody,

It's Xmas time and we just did a lot of improvements on the North Pole ride!
Maybe you'll miss the Santa Claus with you in the sleigh cart but that's because now he's working to distribute the presents on the ride!

The track is much smoother to give you and your whole family more comfort during the ride! And the level details have been increased in quantity and quality.

We hope you have a great experience and don't forget to rate us in the store

If you have any question or suggestion please let us know using our channels:
Discord: https://discord.gg/SrjFhJB
Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/998863630630292/
E-mail: dev@b4t.games

It's already available on Quest 1, Quest 2 and Rift S.

Don't forget to also check our social media for more updates. We're @b4t.games on Facebook and Instagram.

Kind regards,
B4Team.

nodes.title: Armageddon Remaster
nodes.body_text:
Hello everybody,

Thinking of reaching the latest generation of VR Standalone graphics, we remastered the entire Armaggedon level.

- The 3D models were replaced by newer ones, much more detailed and with higher texture quality.
- The tracks have been completely remade into a smoother and realistic path leaving physics to act in a more precise and comfortable way.
- Ambient light now has more nuances with shadows.

Our team is still working on new zombies and events to please you even more, filling in the gaps it may still have.

We hope you have a great experience and don't forget to rate us in the store

If you have any question or suggestion please let us know using our channels:
Discord: https://discord.gg/SrjFhJB
Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/998863630630292/
E-mail: dev@b4t.games

It's already available on Quest 1/2 and Rift S.

Don't forget to also check our social media for more updates. We're @b4t.games on Facebook and Instagram.

Kind regards,
B4Team.

node.internet_connection_name: 下载内容需要连接网络

node.reviewDescription: I saw this game when I first got my oculus quest and I love roller coasters and it was free I had to try it. The graphics are pretty cool and you do feel like you are on a roller coaster however, this games me a bad motion sickness feeling which normal roller coasters don't. I tried using the helmet with the blinders but that didn't help at all. I had to focus on the target on the front of the cart the whole time which brought my experience and fun level down. Eventually the motion sickness got too much to bare and I had to quit the game before my ride was over. Its fun if you can bare the motion sickness or if you don't experience it but I dont think I will be able to play it anymore.

website_page_meta.description:
"加入 Epic Roller Coasters ，乘坐过山车在特色场景和环境飞速穿行，感受异于生活的刺激冒险！
四大模式等你挑战：单人模式、多人模式、竞速模式和射击模式。

在每趟旅程中，您将有机会进入奇异世界探奇，使用各种过山车和武器应对挑战，感受非同凡响的冒险！

本游戏所有挑战适用各个水平的玩家体验。与家人和好友一起展开历险，其乐融融。"
website_page_meta.title: 疯狂过山车 · Oculus Quest
